pullrequest.title: Add clipping for depth camera on rgbd camera sensor

content.raw:
I'm not sure if we want to completely ignore `<camera><clip>`. My suggestion would be to use `<depth_camera><clip>`  only if `<depth_camera>` exists, otherwise, use `<camera><clip>`. This will maintain the current behavior, but allow users to set a separate clip parameter if they want to.

Also, if we ignore `<camera><clip>` for depth sensors, it can be confusing to debug for users if they forget to set `<camera><depth_camera><clip>` because the sensor will just pick up a default value and changing `<camera><clip>` won't make any difference. This is especially true for the depth-only sensor because users probably won't know that changing `<camera><clip>` won't affect anything without digging into the code.
